subject: Order#SSN2568
description_text:
To whom it may concern,

I paid an extra $30 to have my order express shipped to arrive within 2-5
business days. This order has not since arrived within that time period.
The tracking information hasn't updated in three days. This company is not
going to take advantage of this consumer. I want a full refund on the
shipping cost that I paid extra for an item that is clearly not going to be
here in time.

Sincerely,

Kevin Pawlaczyk

conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin Pawlaczyk,    We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. Such prolonged delays are indeed uncommon for FedEx shipments. Furthermore, the estimated transit time for express logistics is 3-7 working days. As this is now the sixth working day, we are confident your parcel will be delivered within the next days.  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=884175150210&trkqual=12029~884175150210~FDEG
